about_the_game:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes:

  • Empire rank 15 recon interceptor “Cyning”
  • Active module Hacking booster “Konung”
  • Special title “Master of Intelligence” — for successfully completing several recon objectives using “Cyning”
  • Special ammunition against aliens — “Resonating crystal”, “Resonating charges”, “Resonating slugs” — 30 pcs.
  • Special missiles “Magnetic mine” — 30 pcs.
  • Portrait “Zolvin Ivec”

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 14 days!

Dangerous missions, difficult battles — all of this is a simple matter for the “Cyning” ship! This first prototype, designed specifically for reconnaissance operations, withstood the real test in combat with the Aliens and managed to win. It is equipped with basic weapons, which have proven their effectiveness in combat. The engineers who escaped with the help of this ship have made several improvements, and now you can take full advantage of this ship! Non-serial production of “Cyning” is already established, and you can become one of the first pilots to be able to use this ship. The blueprints are waiting for you at the Mercenary Center — go ahead and embark on an unforgettable journey!

Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!

This pack includes:

name: Star Conflict - Cyning

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection

supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Hungarian, Czech, Ukrainian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
